author: alfred_the_buttler
title: Great set for learning how to build
review:
This comes with a very cute board book that teaches your kids how to build the animals.  My son loved this when he first started being able to build, and it taught him how to build the animals.  The cow, sheep, and pig are easy thanks to their simple color scheme.  The rooster was buildable, but my son could only get the shape, not the colors, when he first started.

Of course the best part is that the set includes pieces with eyes which can be used to create all sorts of silly things, such as cars with eyes!
